alias.name: i
alias.comment: Installs a project with Maven. Requires a valid Maven-POM.

alias.name: s
alias.comment: Creates Maven site. Requires a valid Maven-POM.

alias.name: sd
alias.comment: Creates and deploys a project and its Maven site. Requires a valid Maven-POM.

alias.name: l
alias.comment: Formats license headers in a Maven project. Requires a valid Maven-POM and a configured maven-license-plugin.

group.name: project-sync
group.comment: Aliases synchronizing project information with external information systems.

alias.name: b
alias.comment:
Syncs Bugzilla product with Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the bugzilla plugin's homepage.

alias.name: bi
alias.comment:
Creates product in Bugzilla based on Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the bugzilla plugin's homepage.

alias.name: chj
alias.comment:
Creates Hudson job based on Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the hudson plugin's homepage.

alias.name: dhj
alias.comment:
Deletes Hudson job based on Maven-POM.
For more information please refer to the hudson plugin's homepage.

alias.name: a
alias.comment:
Analyzes the dependencies of this project and determines which are: used and declared; used and undeclared; unused and declared. This goal is intended to be used standalone, thus it always executes the test-compile phase - use the dependency:analyze-only goal instead when participating in the build lifecycle.
For more information please refer to the analyze mojo.

alias.name: pu
alias.comment:
Displays all plugins that have newer versions available.
For more information please refer to the display-plugin-updates mojo.

alias.name: du
alias.comment:
Displays all dependencies that have newer versions available.
For more information please refer to the display-dependency-updates mojo.

group.name: project-release
group.comment: Aliases to release a project with Maven.

alias.name: r
alias.comment: Prepares and performs the release of a project.

alias.name: rpr
alias.comment:
Prepares the release of a project.
For more information please refer to the prepare mojo.

alias.name: rpe
alias.comment:
Performs the release of a project after it has been prepared.
For more information please refer to the perform mojo.

alias.name: rr
alias.comment:
Runs a rollback after a failed release. Please note that any SCM tags have to be removed manually.
For more information please refer to the rollback mojo.

alias.name: rc
alias.comment:
Runs a clean after a failed release.
For more information please refer to the clean mojo.

group.name: java
group.comment: Aliases setting environment variables for the Java runtime.

alias.name: j6
alias.comment: Sets environment variable JAVA_HOME to existing JAVA_HOME_6.

alias.name: j7
alias.comment: Sets environment variable JAVA_HOME to existing JAVA_HOME_7.
